title: EntityChangeTracker
contents:
mode_edit code
API > @ngrx/data

EntityChangeTrackerlink

Methods for tracking, committing, and reverting/undoing unsaved entity changes. Used by EntityCollectionReducerMethods which should call tracker methods BEFORE modifying the collection. See EntityChangeTracker docs.

interface EntityChangeTracker<T> { commitAll(collection: EntityCollection<T>): EntityCollection<T> commitMany(entityOrIdList: (string | number | T)[], collection: EntityCollection<T>): EntityCollection<T> commitOne(entityOrId: string | number | T, collection: EntityCollection<T>): EntityCollection<T> mergeQueryResults(entities: T[], collection: EntityCollection<T>, mergeStrategy?: MergeStrategy): EntityCollection<T> mergeSaveAdds(entities: T[], collection: EntityCollection<T>, mergeStrategy?: MergeStrategy): EntityCollection<T> mergeSaveDeletes(keys: (string | number)[], collection: EntityCollection<T>, mergeStrategy?: MergeStrategy): EntityCollection<T> mergeSaveUpserts(entities: T[], collection: EntityCollection<T>, mergeStrategy?: MergeStrategy): EntityCollection<T> mergeSaveUpdates(updates: UpdateResponseData<T>[], collection: EntityCollection<T>, mergeStrategy?: MergeStrategy, skipUnchanged?: boolean): EntityCollection<T> trackAddMany(entities: T[], collection: EntityCollection<T>, mergeStrategy?: MergeStrategy): EntityCollection<T> trackAddOne(entity: T, collection: EntityCollection<T>, mergeStrategy?: MergeStrategy): EntityCollection<T> trackDeleteMany(keys: (string | number)[], collection: EntityCollection<T>, mergeStrategy?: MergeStrategy): EntityCollection<T> trackDeleteOne(key: string | number, collection: EntityCollection<T>, mergeStrategy?: MergeStrategy): EntityCollection<T> trackUpdateMany(updates: Update<T>[], collection: EntityCollection<T>, mergeStrategy?: MergeStrategy): EntityCollection<T> trackUpdateOne(update: Update<T>, collection: EntityCollection<T>, mergeStrategy?: MergeStrategy): EntityCollection<T> trackUpsertMany(entities: T[], collection: EntityCollection<T>, mergeStrategy?: MergeStrategy): EntityCollection<T> trackUpsertOne(entity: T, collection: EntityCollection<T>, mergeStrategy?: MergeStrategy): EntityCollection<T> undoAll(collection: EntityCollection<T>): EntityCollection<T> undoMany(entityOrIdList: (string | number | T)[], collection: EntityCollection<T>): EntityCollection<T> undoOne(entityOrId: string | number | T, collection: EntityCollection<T>): EntityCollection<T> }

Class implementationslink

  • EntityChangeTrackerBase

Methodslink

commitAll() link

mode_edit code

Commit all changes as when the collection has been completely reloaded from the server. Harmless when there are no entity changes to commit.
commitAll(collection: EntityCollection<T>): EntityCollection<T>

Parameters

collection

The entity collection

Returns

EntityCollection<T>

commitMany() link

mode_edit code

Commit changes for the given entities as when they have been refreshed from the server. Harmless when there are no entity changes to commit.
commitMany(entityOrIdList: (string | number | T)[], collection: EntityCollection<T>): EntityCollection<T>

Parameters

entityOrIdList

The entities to clear tracking or their ids.
collection

The entity collection

Returns

EntityCollection<T>

commitOne() link

mode_edit code

Commit changes for the given entity as when it have been refreshed from the server. Harmless when no entity changes to commit.
commitOne(entityOrId: string | number | T, collection: EntityCollection<T>): EntityCollection<T>

Parameters

entityOrId

The entity to clear tracking or its id.
collection

The entity collection

Returns

EntityCollection<T>

mergeQueryResults() link

mode_edit code

Merge query results into the collection, adjusting the ChangeState per the mergeStrategy.
mergeQueryResults(entities: T[], collection: EntityCollection<T>, mergeStrategy?: MergeStrategy): EntityCollection<T>

Parameters

entities

Entities returned from querying the server.
collection

The entity collection
mergeStrategy

How to merge a queried entity when the corresponding entity in the collection has an unsaved change. If not specified, implementation supplies a default strategy.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

EntityCollection<T>: The merged EntityCollection.

mergeSaveAdds() link

mode_edit code

Merge result of saving new entities into the collection, adjusting the ChangeState per the mergeStrategy. The default is MergeStrategy.OverwriteChanges.
mergeSaveAdds(entities: T[], collection: EntityCollection<T>, mergeStrategy?: MergeStrategy): EntityCollection<T>

Parameters

entities

Entities returned from saving new entities to the server.
collection

The entity collection
mergeStrategy

How to merge a saved entity when the corresponding entity in the collection has an unsaved change. If not specified, implementation supplies a default strategy.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

EntityCollection<T>: The merged EntityCollection.

mergeSaveDeletes() link

mode_edit code

Merge successful result of deleting entities on the server that have the given primary keys Clears the entity changeState for those keys unless the MergeStrategy is ignoreChanges.
mergeSaveDeletes(keys: (string | number)[], collection: EntityCollection<T>, mergeStrategy?: MergeStrategy): EntityCollection<T>

Parameters

keys

Type: (string | number)[].
collection

The entity collection
mergeStrategy

How to adjust change tracking when the corresponding entity in the collection has an unsaved change. If not specified, implementation supplies a default strategy.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

EntityCollection<T>: The merged EntityCollection.

mergeSaveUpserts() link

mode_edit code

Merge result of saving upserted entities into the collection, adjusting the ChangeState per the mergeStrategy. The default is MergeStrategy.OverwriteChanges.
mergeSaveUpserts(entities: T[], collection: EntityCollection<T>, mergeStrategy?: MergeStrategy): EntityCollection<T>

Parameters

entities

Entities returned from saving upsert entities to the server.
collection

The entity collection
mergeStrategy

How to merge a saved entity when the corresponding entity in the collection has an unsaved change. If not specified, implementation supplies a default strategy.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

EntityCollection<T>: The merged EntityCollection.

mergeSaveUpdates() link

mode_edit code

Merge result of saving updated entities into the collection, adjusting the ChangeState per the mergeStrategy. The default is MergeStrategy.OverwriteChanges.
mergeSaveUpdates(updates: UpdateResponseData<T>[], collection: EntityCollection<T>, mergeStrategy?: MergeStrategy, skipUnchanged?: boolean): EntityCollection<T>

Parameters

updates

Entity response data returned from saving updated entities to the server.
collection

The entity collection
mergeStrategy

How to merge a saved entity when the corresponding entity in the collection has an unsaved change. If not specified, implementation supplies a default strategy.

Optional. Default is undefined.
skipUnchanged

True means skip update if server didn't change it. False by default. If the update was optimistic and the server didn't make more changes of its own then the updates are already in the collection and shouldn't make them again.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

EntityCollection<T>: The merged EntityCollection.

trackAddMany() link

mode_edit code

Track multiple entities before adding them to the collection. Does NOT add to the collection (the reducer's job).
trackAddMany(entities: T[], collection: EntityCollection<T>, mergeStrategy?: MergeStrategy): EntityCollection<T>

Parameters

entities

The entities to add. They must all have their ids.
collection

The entity collection
mergeStrategy

Track by default. Don't track if is MergeStrategy.IgnoreChanges. If not specified, implementation supplies a default strategy.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

EntityCollection<T>

trackAddOne() link

mode_edit code

Track an entity before adding it to the collection. Does NOT add to the collection (the reducer's job).
trackAddOne(entity: T, collection: EntityCollection<T>, mergeStrategy?: MergeStrategy): EntityCollection<T>

Parameters

entity

The entity to add. It must have an id.
collection

The entity collection
mergeStrategy

Track by default. Don't track if is MergeStrategy.IgnoreChanges. If not specified, implementation supplies a default strategy.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

EntityCollection<T>

trackDeleteMany() link

mode_edit code

Track multiple entities before removing them with the intention of deleting them on the server. Does NOT remove from the collection (the reducer's job).
trackDeleteMany(keys: (string | number)[], collection: EntityCollection<T>, mergeStrategy?: MergeStrategy): EntityCollection<T>

Parameters

keys

The primary keys of the entities to delete.
collection

The entity collection
mergeStrategy

Track by default. Don't track if is MergeStrategy.IgnoreChanges.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

EntityCollection<T>

trackDeleteOne() link

mode_edit code

Track an entity before it is removed with the intention of deleting it on the server. Does NOT remove from the collection (the reducer's job).
trackDeleteOne(key: string | number, collection: EntityCollection<T>, mergeStrategy?: MergeStrategy): EntityCollection<T>

Parameters

key

The primary key of the entity to delete.
collection

The entity collection
mergeStrategy

Track by default. Don't track if is MergeStrategy.IgnoreChanges.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

EntityCollection<T>

trackUpdateMany() link

mode_edit code

Track multiple entities before updating them in the collection. Does NOT update the collection (the reducer's job).
trackUpdateMany(updates: Update<T>[], collection: EntityCollection<T>, mergeStrategy?: MergeStrategy): EntityCollection<T>

Parameters

updates

The entities to update.
collection

The entity collection
mergeStrategy

Track by default. Don't track if is MergeStrategy.IgnoreChanges.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

EntityCollection<T>

trackUpdateOne() link

mode_edit code

Track an entity before updating it in the collection. Does NOT update the collection (the reducer's job).
trackUpdateOne(update: Update<T>, collection: EntityCollection<T>, mergeStrategy?: MergeStrategy): EntityCollection<T>

Parameters

update

The entity to update.
collection

The entity collection
mergeStrategy

Track by default. Don't track if is MergeStrategy.IgnoreChanges.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

EntityCollection<T>

trackUpsertMany() link

mode_edit code

Track multiple entities before upserting (adding and updating) them to the collection. Does NOT update the collection (the reducer's job).
trackUpsertMany(entities: T[], collection: EntityCollection<T>, mergeStrategy?: MergeStrategy): EntityCollection<T>

Parameters

entities

The entities to add or update. They must be complete entities with ids.
collection

The entity collection
mergeStrategy

Track by default. Don't track if is MergeStrategy.IgnoreChanges.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

EntityCollection<T>

trackUpsertOne() link

mode_edit code

Track an entity before upsert (adding and updating) it to the collection. Does NOT update the collection (the reducer's job).
trackUpsertOne(entity: T, collection: EntityCollection<T>, mergeStrategy?: MergeStrategy): EntityCollection<T>

Parameters

entity

Type: T.
collection

The entity collection
mergeStrategy

Track by default. Don't track if is MergeStrategy.IgnoreChanges.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

EntityCollection<T>

undoAll() link

mode_edit code

Revert the unsaved changes for all collection. Harmless when there are no entity changes to undo.
undoAll(collection: EntityCollection<T>): EntityCollection<T>

Parameters

collection

The entity collection

Returns

EntityCollection<T>

undoMany() link

mode_edit code

Revert the unsaved changes for the given entities. Harmless when there are no entity changes to undo.
undoMany(entityOrIdList: (string | number | T)[], collection: EntityCollection<T>): EntityCollection<T>

Parameters

entityOrIdList

The entities to revert or their ids.
collection

The entity collection

Returns

EntityCollection<T>

undoOne() link

mode_edit code

Revert the unsaved changes for the given entity. Harmless when there are no entity changes to undo.
undoOne(entityOrId: string | number | T, collection: EntityCollection<T>): EntityCollection<T>

Parameters

entityOrId

The entity to revert or its id.
collection

The entity collection

Returns

EntityCollection<T>
